column1: '''''thelion''''' is an [[Elvish]] word, only appearing as an element in the names ''[[Ecthelion]]'' and ''Aegthelion''.<ref name=Maeglin>{{WJ

[[Didier Willis]] notes ''thelion'' as an unattested [[Sindarin]] noun meaning "one who remains firm in his purpose".<ref>[[Didier Willis]], [http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] at [http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com] (accessed 19 June 2011)</ref>
